testCase.name: /counters: it should GET all the counters
/GET/api/counter/:id: it should GET all the request types of the counter with id=5
/GET/api/counters/request/:tag: it should GET all conters that serve the request type with tag_name=withdrawals
/POST counter: it should not POST a counter without the id
/POST counter: it should POST a counter with id=9
/DELETE/counter/:id: it should DELETE counters with id =7
/DELETE/counter/:id/:request: it should DELETE counters with id =7
/request_type: it should GET all the request_types
/GET/api/request_type/:tag_name: it should GET the service_time="00:10:00" by the given tag_name="shipping"
/POST request_type: it should not POST a request_type without service_time
/POST request_type: it should POST a request_type with tag_name="testing"
/DELETE/request_type/:tag_name: it should DELETE a request_type with tag name "testing"
/PUT/request_type/:tag_name: it should UPDATE the service time given the tag name
/PUT/request_type/:tag_name: it should UPDATE the service time given the tag name
/PUT/request_type/change/:tag_name: it should CHANGE the tag_name of a given request_type
/PUT/request_type/change/:tag_name: it should CHANGE the tag_name of a given request_type
